item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Exercise 1 from the notes on stochastic optimization. Write a computer program in any language of your choice to find the optimal policy. You must submit your code along with your solution. Exercise 2 from the notes on stochastic optimization. Write a computer program in any language of your choice to find the optimal policy. You must submit your code along with your solution.
